articles.title: Islamic State militant gets life in U.S. prison over killing of American hostages - Reuters
articles.description: A U.S. federal judge on Friday sentenced a member of an Islamic State cell known as "The Beatles" to life in prison for involvement in a hostage-taking plot that led to the killings of American journalists and aid workers in Syria.
